snippet: As befits a Bond-like heist, the police reportedly have no leads as to who might have taken the nine customized cars from a garage near Düsseldorf, Germany.
abstract: As befits a Bond-like heist, the police reportedly have no leads as to who might have taken the nine customized cars from a garage near Düsseldorf, Germany.

headline.main: Cars for New Bond Movie Are Stolen in Germany
